response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your operations. Given its value to you, I am confident it will be a worthwhile investment. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at an exceptional price of $1,200,000. This offer represents a substantial discount compared to the market value of $1,500,000, allowing you to maximize your savings while securing this valuable asset. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you. Should you require any further information or assistance, please do not hesitate to contact me.", "product_price": 1200000}
